channel.title: Adventure on Little Gold Fish
channel.description: Recent content in Adventure on Little Gold Fish

item.title: R Adventure Series -1
item.description: Preparing pkgs # I want to use studentdata in this pkgs require("LearnBayes") require("dplyr") Creating for loop data(studentdata) # this dataset contains the Answers to a sheet of questions given to 657 students in introductory statistics classes, however, there are some missings I will show in the adventure series 2. stu <- studentdata head(stu, 3) ## for loop stu_v2 <- stu %>% mutate(sleeptime = WakeUp - ToSleep) # for(i in 1:length(stu_v2$Student)) { cat("\t", "The student whose ID number is", i, "likes to drink", stu$Drink[[i]], "\b;\n", ifelse(stu_v2$Gender[[i]] == "female", "her", "his"), "sleep time is", stu_v2$sleeptime[[i]], "\b.
